bomberMan.gamePlay.View

Class GameBoardView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • bomberMan.gamePlay.View.GameBoardView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class GameBoardView
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener
    This class contains a set of methods that display the Game Objects contained in a GameBoard object. Also, this class contains methods that display information about the current game session such as the current time session, the stage and the number of lives of the bomberman. The documentation for the methods contained in this class includes briefs descriptions of the implementations. Such descriptions should be regarded as implementation notes, rather than parts of specifications
    Author:
    Tong and Andres Felipe
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameBoardView

        public GameBoardView(javax.swing.JFrame myFrame,
                     int numLivesRemainingBomberMan,
                     int[] powerUpsAcquired,
                     UserDatabase DB,
                     int currentStage)
        Parameters:
        myFrame - a Jframe object
        numLivesRemainingBomberMan - an integer that represents the current number of lives of the bomberman.
        powerUpsAcquired - an array of integers that represents the power ups kept by the bomberman.
        DB - the UserDatabase containing all the user's information.
        currentStage - is an integer that represents the current stage of the game session.

      • GameBoardView

        public GameBoardView(javax.swing.JFrame myFrame,
                     GameBoard myBoard,
                     int numLivesRemainingBomberMan,
                     int[] powerUpsAcquired,
                     UserDatabase DB,
                     int currentStage)
        This constructor creates a GameBoardView.
        Parameters:
        myBoard - object that represents the game board of the current session.
        myFrame - a Jframe object
        numLivesRemainingBomberMan - an integer that represents the current number of lives of the bomberman.
        powerUpsAcquired - an array of integers that represents the power ups kept by the bomberman.
        DB - the UserDatabase containing all the user's information.
        currentStage - is an integer that represents the current stage of the game session.

      • updateGameBoardView

        public void updateGameBoardView()

      • paintComponent

        public void paintComponent(java.awt.Graphics g)
        This function Draws the gameBoard on the screen. Renders the data only. Any changes shouldn't happen here.
